data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Colombo, Wesley D., Alencar, Isabel D. C. C., Limeira-De-Oliveira, Francisco, Azevedo, Celso O. (2018): New species and records of Dissomphalus Ashmead (Hymenoptera, Bethylidae) from Cerrado, Caatinga and relicts of the Atlantic Forest from northeastern Brazil. Zootaxa 4462 (1): 1-40, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4462.1.1|154 occurrences
